OOC: I wish I could say something, but I'm struggling not to cry upon my de=
parted friend's wishes. I'll take this day of silence as well, I can't unde=
rstand why anyone wouldn't. Minime was once the co-owner of Neo Beast Machi=
nes RPG, and once the owner left, he was granted the whole thing. Before he=
 left, he GAVE me Neo Beast Machines, the whole RPG, as well as his charact=
er Gotron. I promised never to let go of Gotron and to keep him forever. Bu=
t I feel guilty I never pumped Gotron up to a main player. So when the stor=
yline comes to me, expect to see alot more Gotron. That's all I can say rig=
ht now, I'm trying to keep from crying. So I end this with goodbye, minime,=
 Frank Reinhart, Michael Smith. Rest assured I won't forget you...
  ----- =
Original Message ----- 
  From: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 4:07 PM
  Subject: Minime3:16


=
  I am greatly sad over the happening of minime. He was a great frined and =
a 
  great role player. His brother emailed me and a few others priatly. Mi=
nime 
  said that we kept him going. If not for this rpg that he would have=
 done this 
  a long time ago. I hope that makes you proud to be apart of s=
oemthing that 
  could give a person like minime hope. I have given the ide=
a to yanshosh to 
  make a day of silence in memory of Minime through out t=
he rpg for one day. If 
  some dont agree with this thats fine. But me and =
dachande have agreed to do 
  this ourselves no matter what. The date will =
be set for our day of silence   
  some time soon. 
        Yahoo! Groups S=
ponsor
